description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nOrthoclase:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE} have 50% more {STAT_defense}. Enemies cannot be resistant to {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}. This trait does not stack.
name: Orthoclase Feldspar
